term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - film badge in radioanalytical chemistry
term.title: film badge

item.text: A package containing one or more small photographic films for approximate measurement of radiation exposure, used for the purpose of monitoring personnel.

sources.item: PAC, 1982, 54, 1533. 'Glossary of terms used in nuclear analytical chemistry (Provisional)' on page 1542 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198254081533)
